title: Website Login Issue
description: Customer cannot log in to their account. Getting an 'Invalid Credentials' error even with the correct password.

title: Billing Query: Double Charge
description: Customer reports being charged twice for the monthly subscription. Needs immediate refund.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Suggesting a dark mode feature for better night time viewing experience.

title: Slow Performance on Dashboard
description: The main user dashboard is loading very slowly, especially when there are many data points.

title: Broken Link on Contact Page
description: The 'Live Chat' button on the contact us page redirects to a 404 error.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer requested a password reset but hasn't received the email in their inbox or spam folder.

title: Typo in Footer Text
description: There is a spelling mistake ('Copyrigt' instead of 'Copyright') in the website footer.

title: Mobile View Layout Breakage
description: The website layout breaks apart when viewed on a small mobile device (iPhone SE).

title: Integration Setup Assistance
description: Need help setting up the third-party API integration with their system.

title: Unexpected Logout Issue
description: The user is being logged out automatically after only 5 minutes of inactivity.

title: Request for Documentation Update
description: The documentation for the 'Export Data' feature is outdated and confusing.

title: Error 500 on Checkout Page
description: When trying to finalize a purchase, the user encounters a Server Error 500.

title: Minor UI Alignment Issue
description: A button is slightly misaligned by a few pixels on the product details page.

title: Subscription Cancellation Query
description: Customer wants to know the procedure for cancelling their current subscription plan.

title: Report Generation Failure
description: The weekly sales report fails to generate and throws an 'Unknown Error'.

title: Cannot Upload Profile Picture
description: User is unable to upload a profile picture. The progress bar gets stuck at 99%.

title: License Key Activation Problem
description: The purchased license key shows as 'Invalid' when trying to activate the software.

title: Need assistance with API documentation
description: Customer is struggling to understand how to authenticate with the new API version.

title: Wishlist items disappearing
description: Items saved to the user's wishlist occasionally disappear after refreshing the page.

title: Suggestion for filter improvements
description: Suggesting adding an 'Sort by Date' option to the main product listing page.
